content.rendered:
This season, we are launching our exclusive Autumn Colour Packages, designed in collaboration with the new Davines colour range, The Present Time. These curated services highlight the versatility and richness of the Davines system, giving you a seamless way to experiment with dimensional blondes, soft glosses, or natural grey transitions—all while maintaining your hair’s health and shine.

Gloss-Like Glass Package – $275
All-over Gloss Service + Style Cut & Blow-dry + Davines Liquid Luster Shine Treatment
For radiant, mirror-like shine and enhanced depth.

Trans-seasonal Blonde Package – $400
Face Frame Foils, All-over Gloss Service + Style Cut & Blow-dry + Davines Liquid Luster Shine Treatment
Perfect for reviving your summer blonde with soft, natural dimension.

Grey-Blending Package – $450
Low-commitment Root Colour, Face Frame Foils, All-over Gloss Service + Style Cut & Blow-dry + Davines Liquid Luster Shine Treatment
Ideal for those curious about blending greys without committing to permanent coverage or clients wanting to begin the transition from permanent colour.

 

Packages available with Advanced – Premiere Stylists.
